errors.error_description: Specifies outdated Python 2.7 version for development installation
correction_candidates: To install pretalx for development, first install Python 3.8+ and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
To install pretalx for development, first install Python 3.6 or higher and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
To install pretalx for development, first install Python 3.9+ and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
To install pretalx for development, first install the latest Python version and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: To install pretalx for development, first install Python 3.8+ and then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
